title: Don't pick Gragas in ranked if you want to climb
body: I hear he throws pretty hard.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Light Burner,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ZFQ2yrMr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-09-04T21:18:51.118+0000)
>
> Only his barrel.

Yea...that's the joke...lol
Problem is as you can see by the downvotes if you dont point it out people think you're being serious
Its not his fault people can't read that its in memes and games. He shouldn’t have to say it.
I said the same thing about my teammate not being able to read a map and its not my fault they couldnt do it and people call it toxic.

> [{quoted}](name=Light Burner,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ZFQ2yrMr,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-04T21:48:59.973+0000)
>
> I said the same thing about my teammate not being able to read a map and its not my fault they couldnt do it and people call it toxic.

Is it too hard to just let a joke be a joke?

I was expecting a joke about how he's too fat to go up a ladder 

wp wp
